name: CARROT: The First Seed
description:
THIS GAME IS DESIGNED TO BE ENJOYED FOR ABOUT 30 MINUTES

Chase Fox's fourth game and the third installment in the “CARROT” series.

CARROT : The First Seed is a tiny slice-of-life fantasy comedy kinetic visual novel that tells a story of a group of people who lives in a small whimsical coastal town.

This game is a kinetic visual novel, which means it will not provide choices that shape your story or any other interactions. The only way to interact with the game is to click anywhere on the screen when a dialog box appears, to move the story forward and use the scene jumper to jump to specific scenes in the story.

Story

There stands a small coastal town. For a reason no one knows, cares or has time to find out, a family of two magical individuals and their son just moved into it. Follow the delightfully whimsical lives of the people of this town : the new family, the old family that owns a cafe, the famous celebrity and the detective.

Genre

Short, Light, Slice-of-life, Fantasy, Comedy

Features

  • Original Art, Music & Sound Design
  • Scene Jumper : press Esc at any time to bring up a pause menu that will let you jump to specific scenes in the story, no save slot required



  • Hand-Crafted Art




  • A Quirky Cast Of Characters

---------------------------------

Story, Art, Music and Sound Design
by ChaseFOX

Proofread
by Eskay

---------------------------------
